summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 1 and 2, Replat of Green Lake Home Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by East Green Lake Way, Latona Avenue, Sunnyside Avenue, North 75th Street and Woodlawn Avenue, by paving, constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5949, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
